keyword: calories in a in and out burger
title: Calories in an In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Learn calories in a In-N-Out burger: a standard hamburger has 390 kcal, plus full macros, sodium, and tweaks for cheese or animal style.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: fresh beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and exact ingredients; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out hamburger provides 390 kcal, 16 g protein, and 730 mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions)
No spread (protein style with lettuce wrap)

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard In-N-Out burger?
What are the macros for an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: 39 g carbs, 16 g protein, 19 g fat per burger.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in In-N-Out burgers?
faqs.a: Yes, about 730 mg per standard burger from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: How does cheese affect calories in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases it to 480 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in In-N-Out burger without bun?
faqs.a: Protein style (lettuce wrap) is around 240-290 kcal, depending on extras.
